name: Escape Space (zander gamer)
description:
this is a game that is in development, shooting game where you control 2 characters at the same time, you need both to complete the game.

The game is in an alpha phase, very early, so it's still very simple.

every monday i'll be updating him on something, until i complete the game for good.

I look forward to everyone's support with feedback, so that I can improve more and more and so that everyone can have fun.
